name: PeerMe MultiSig: Propose Transfer Execute ESDT
title: Propose ESDT token transfer and execution
description: Use when a user wants to send ESDT tokens from their multi-sig wallet. Creates a proposal that needs board member signatures before the token transfer is executed.

inputs.name: Recipient Address
inputs.description: The wallet address to send tokens to.

inputs.name: Tokens
inputs.description: The ESDT tokens to transfer (format: TOKEN-000000|amount).

inputs.name: Gas Limit
inputs.description: Optional gas limit for the execution (leave empty for default).

inputs.name: Function Call
inputs.description: Optional function call data (hex encoded bytes).

messages.success: Proposal created successfully. Action ID: {{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}}. The proposal to transfer ESDT tokens is now awaiting signatures.

label.en: Get notified when this proposal is signed
label.de: Benachrichtigung erhalten, wenn dieser Vorschlag unterzeichnet wird

body.en: A board member has signed proposal #{{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}} to transfer ESDT tokens
body.de: Ein Vorstandsmitglied hat Vorschlag #{{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}} zur Übertragung von ESDT-Token unterzeichnet
